title: France 1-1 Germany (AET, 5-6 pens): Berger´s heroics secure semi-final spot
description: Ten-player Germany beat France 6-5 on penalties after a 1-1 draw to seal their place in the semi-finals of Euro 2025. Ann-Katrin Berger made herself the hero with two saves, the second of which ensured Germany’s progression to the last four. title: Farke: Bamford not part of Leeds´ Premier League plans
description: Leeds United manager Daniel Farke has revealed that Patrick Bamford is not part of his plans for next season. The striker was left out of Leeds’ squad in their 0-0 draw against rivals Manchester United for their pre-season friendly in Sweden.
